main event: A pilot observed one star-shaped white object in flight from the north to southwest from an aircraft on top of clouds, believing it to be a satellite.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes,The object's motion was contrary to normal satellite trajectories,The pilot's conclusion might have been influenced by the observation conditions at dusk,The azimuth of the object was 240 degrees,There was an initial confusion about the object's direction, adding to the sighting's intrigue.
